contentToAvoid.reason: Hard to visualize, boring images, loses audience
examples: Deep Dive into API Authentication Protocols
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Simplify to practical outcomes - focus on WHAT it does, not HOW it works internally

contentToAvoid.reason: Looks like every other account, no personality, no value
examples: Dreams Don't Work Unless You Do
Success is a Journey Not a Destination
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Specific actionable advice with your voice - tie motivation to actual business results

contentToAvoid.reason: Divides audience, distracts from products, creates conflict
examples: Hot-button social issues unrelated to business
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Focus on business automation, AI tools, local entrepreneurship success

contentToAvoid.reason: AI cannot accurately recreate specific UIs, will look fake
examples: Exact Settings to Change in Your Dashboard
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: General concepts and principles, not pixel-perfect UI recreations

contentToAvoid.reason: Liability issues, requires disclaimers, not your expertise area
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: General business efficiency and automation - stay in your lane

contentToAvoid.category: Celebrity Drama or Pop Culture Gossip
contentToAvoid.reason: Off-brand, damages professional credibility, attracts wrong audience
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Business and tech trends from credible sources with practical takeaways

contentToAvoid.reason: Damages trust, looks unprofessional if wrong, erodes credibility
examples: AI Will Replace 80% of Jobs by 2025
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Real data from credible sources OR clearly labeled hypothetical scenarios

contentToAvoid.reason: Looks petty and unprofessional, bad karma, reflects poorly on you
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Focus on what YOU do well, honest comparisons without negativity

contentToAvoid.reason: People scroll past, hard to visualize, loses attention quickly
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Short punchy visual content - if it needs 15 slides, it needs a blog post instead

contentToAvoid.category: Get Rich Quick or Scammy Vibes
contentToAvoid.reason: Destroys trust instantly, looks desperate, attracts wrong audience
examples: Make $10K/Month with This One AI Trick
Secret Hack Banks Don't Want You to Know
contentToAvoid.betterAlternative: Real results with honest expectations, specific verifiable case studies
